    • nsgl.bit.variation.DelGen

    public class DelGen
extends java.lang.Object
implements Variation_1_1<nsgl.bit.array.Array>, ParameterizedObject<int[]>

    Title: DelGen

    Description: The gene deletion operator. Deletes a gene in the genome

    Version:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • DelGen

        public DelGen(int gene_size,
              int min_length,
              int max_length)

      • DelGen

        public DelGen(int gene_size,
              int min_length,
              int max_length,
              boolean del_last_gene)
        Constructor: create a deletion gene operator that deletes a gene of a genome
        Parameters:
        gene_size - Number of bits defining a gene
        min_length - Minimum number of genes in the chromosome
        max_length - Maximun number of genes in the chromosome
        del_last_gene - Determines if the gene to be deleted is the last in the genome or not. A true value indicates that the last gene is deleted. A false value indiciates that a gene is randomly selected and deleted
